mapper.insert: insert into members (userId, userPw, userName, nickName, email) values(#{userId},#{userPw},#{userName},#{nickName},#{email})
mapper.select: select * from members where userId=#{userId} and userPw=#{userPw}
mapper.update: update members set nickName=#{nickName} userPw=#{new_password} email=#{email} where userId=#{userId} and userPw=#{userPw}
mapper.delete: delete from members where userId=#{userId} and userPw=#{userPw}
mapper.update: update members set groupCode1 = #{groupCode1}, groupCode2 = #{groupCode2}, groupCode3 = #{groupCode3}, groupCode4 = #{groupCode4} where userId = #{userId}
